bibl.title: Tax Collection in Roman Arabia: New Evidence from the Babatha Archive.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Mediterranean Historical Review 9 (1994) pp. 256-266. - P. 333: Postscript. - Shows how the document affects existing views of the process of taxation in a Roman province.
